恭候.definition: to look forward to sth; to wait respectfully

恭喜發財.definition: May you have a prosperous New Year! (New Year's greeting)

恭城.definition: Gongcheng Yao autonomous county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi

恭城瑤族自治縣.pinyin: gōng chéng yáo zú zì zhì xiàn
恭城瑤族自治縣.definition: Gongcheng Yao autonomous county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi

恭城縣.definition: Gongcheng Yao autonomous county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi

恭惟.definition: variant of 恭維|恭维[gong1 wei5]

恭敬不如從命.pinyin: gōng jìng bù rú cóng mìng
恭敬不如從命.definition: deference is no substitute for obedience (idiom); (said to accept sb's request, invitation etc)

恭祝.definition: to congratulate respectfully; to wish good luck and success (esp. to a superior); with best wishes (in writing)

恭維.definition: to praise; to speak highly of; compliment; praise

恭賀.definition: to congratulate respectfully; to express good wishes
